ComicInfo.Summary:
Forced to join the S.O.O.F.I. (Save Our Offspring From Indecency) movement- Howard must stop the Supreme SOOFI! Using the Blanditron device, the Supreme SOOFI tries to control Howardâ€™s mind, but to no avail. How will Howard stop the S.O.O.F.I. movement?
Howard comes face to face with the head of SOOFI (Save Our Offspring From Indecency), the organization dedicated to saving the world from sin and sex!
ComicInfo.Title: If You Knew Soofi...!
